items.title: Collaborative Task Creation and Assignment
items.description: Enable users to create tasks, assign them to team members, and set deadlines within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a new task with title, description, assignee, and due date
Assigned team member receives a notification upon task assignment
Task appears in both creator's and assignee's task lists
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 1000 concurrent users without performance degradation
Notifications should be delivered within 5 seconds of task assignment

items.title: Real-time Task Status Updates
items.description: Allow team members to update task status and have changes reflected in real-time for all collaborators.
acceptance_criteria: User can change task status to predefined states (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Done)
Status changes are visible to all team members within 2 seconds
Activity log records all status changes with timestamp and user
non_functional: Real-time updates should work with latency under 2 seconds
System should maintain data consistency across devices

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core collaboration features and real-time updates. Further clarification needed on integrations, platforms, and security requirements.
